thread.section_title: Penn Metals Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Penn Metals Group | pennmetals.com
thread.title: Mike D
thread.title_full: Penn Metals Group reviewed by Mike D

author: Mike D
title: Mike D
text: I signed up and ordered two expensive items on Dec. 8th. My account was billed December 9th, the same day this company closed for business. I don't know why they would have collected my money on the same day they were going out of business. I didn't notice the announcement for many days after the order, assuming it would eventually arrive. I went to great lengths to verify the trust of this business, and even called to talk to a nice woman before placing my order. I now have trouble trusting Internet Businesses. I am willing to take part in criminal prosecution. Any ideas?
